ThingDef.label: IED trap
ThingDef.description: A pair of high-explosive shells connected to a trigger which detonates on touch or bullet impact. Since it is hidden in the surrounding terrain, it cannot be placed adjacent to other traps. Animals can sense these when calm.\n\nSaboteur IEDs cannot be uninstalled, claimed, or deconstructed; they can only be disarmed. Disarming attempts should ideally be made by colonists with high Construction skill.
